abstract: Saudi Arabia will release British man Karl Andree, who has been held in jail for over year on alcohol possession charges.
lead_paragraph: The British foreign secretary, visiting Riyadh, said Karl Andree would be freed after more than a year in a Saudi jail and would not face a public lashing.

headline.main: Saudis Agree to Free Briton Jailed for Having Homemade Wine
headline.print_headline: Saudis Agree to Free Briton Jailed for Wine

snippet: The British foreign secretary, visiting Riyadh, said Karl Andree would be freed after more than a year in a Saudi jail and would not face a public lashing.
